modName: Glorious Daedric ReTex - Darker Armor Version
summary: I'ts a darker version of an already existing mod called Glorious Daedric ReTex but i only change the armor. NOT Weapons.
descriptionHtml:
This Mod is a darker version of an already existing mod called [color=#b6b6b6][b]Glorious Daedric ReTex[/b][/color] but i only change the armor. NOT Weapons from that mod.
I send a PM to the [b][color=#b6b6b6]Glorious Daedric ReTex Mod author[/color][/b] but i can't get an answer since weeks but in his mod page says [i][b][color=#ffff00]"Users can now use/modify do what ever they want with my textures as long as given the proper credits (:"[/color][/b][/i] (See pic in gallery) so I decide to publish this modification of his armor textures with his credits of course.

- The Mod is stand alone.
- The Mod replaces Daedric vanilla armor textures only.

Install:
- Just drag and drop to your Skyrim SE instalation folder.

Uninstall:
- Just delete all files related to the mod.

[b]Tools Used:
[b]- Paint Shop Pro 7 by Jasc Software.[/b]
[b]- DXTBmp 4.0 by Martin Wright[/b].

This mod has a SSE (Skyrim Special Edition / Remastered) version and you can find it following this link: 
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/5838/?]Glorious Daedric ReTex - Darker Armor Version[/url]
[/b]
Take a look to the Original Mod from Skyrim (OldRim) and endorse his nice work:
[color=#3c78d8][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30612/?]Glorious Daedric Retexture[/url][/size][/color] by [color=#3c78d8][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30612/?][b]Gloriouz[/b][/url][/color] 

[b]Mods in Pictures:[/b]
- Mask from [b]Drow Armor[/b] Set (http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27054/?) by [b]newermind43.[/b] [Not Included in this Mod]
- Hair from [b]Kijiko Hair[/b] [b]([/b]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55364/?) by [b]Kijiko and Goldiocks.[/b] [Not Included in this Mod]
- [b]Sofia - The Funny Fully Voiced Follower[/b] by [b]John Jarvis and Christine Slagman[/b] (http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/2180/?).
- [b]Nyclix's ENB-Reshade[/b] by [b]Nyclix [/b](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/3352/?)
- My Mod.

Licensing/Legal:
- Nexus exclusive.
- Please DO NOT re-upload this mod without [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30612/?][b]Gloriouz[/b][/url] permission or mine.
author: ShadowTT
